name: Chon-Ji
meaning: Chon Ji means literally the Heaven and The Earth. It is in the orient interpreted as the creation of the world or the beginning of human history. Therefore it is the initial pattern performed by the beginner. This pattern consists of two separate parts, one to represent the Heaven, the other the Earth.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees clockwise to face 3 o'clock. Step into right walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees clockwise to face 6 o'clock. Step into right walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: niunja so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees clockwise to face 9 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: niunja so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 9 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: niunja so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees clockwise to face 12 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: niunja so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Return to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
